decks.notes: The main strategy of this deck is to control the game by ramping up mana quickly with cards like Azusa, Lost but Seeking, Burgeoning, and Exploration. This allows the player to play powerful lands such as Dark Depths and Eye of Ugin to summon massive Eldrazi creatures like Emrakul, the Promised End and Ulamog, the Ceaseless Hunger. The deck also includes cards like All Is Dust and Oblivion Stone to clear the board of threats while using cards like Realms Uncharted and Primeval Titan to search for key lands. The deck aims to overwhelm the opponent with large creatures and powerful land interactions while maintaining control of the game.

The deck revolves around utilizing a variety of control spells and disruptive abilities to keep the opponent off balance while deploying efficient threats to quickly close out the game. Aragorn, King of Gondor, serves as the commander and provides a powerful aggressive option for the deck. The main deck includes a mix of counterspells, removal, card draw, and versatile threats to control the board and pressure the opponent's life total. By efficiently managing resources and disrupting the opponent's game plan, the deck aims to establish dominance on the battlefield and secure a victory through a combination of strategic plays and timely aggression.

The deck focuses on utilizing sacrifice and graveyard recursion mechanics to overwhelm the opponent with a steady stream of creatures while disrupting their game plan with targeted discard spells. Grist, the Hunger Tide serves as the centerpiece of the strategy, providing a constant source of creature tokens and a versatile removal option. By sacrificing creatures for various effects and using cards like Birthing Pod and Recurring Nightmare to bring them back from the graveyard, the deck aims to build a board presence that the opponent struggles to deal with. With a strong mix of aggressive creatures, efficient removal, and disruptive spells, the deck aims to apply pressure early and maintain a dominant position throughout the game.

The key concept of this deck is to control the game by using a combination of counterspells, removal spells, and card advantage. Hidetsugu and Kairi serve as the commanders who support the control strategy by providing card advantage and flexibility in managing the opponent's threats. The deck includes a wide range of interaction spells such as Counterspell, Drown in the Loch, Fatal Push, and Damnation to deal with various types of threats. In addition, the deck runs powerful card draw and selection spells like Brainstorm, Intuition, and Snapcaster Mage to ensure that the player can maintain control of the game and dictate the pace of play. Ultimately, the goal is to outvalue the opponent and win through incremental advantage.

This deck focuses on a fast and aggressive playstyle, utilizing partner commanders Dargo, the Shipwrecker and Yoshimaru, Ever Faithful to overwhelm opponents with a diverse array of powerful creatures and spells. With a mix of red and white cards, the deck aims to apply consistent pressure and disrupt opponents' strategies with cards like Stoneforge Mystic, Lightning Bolt, and Swords to Plowshares. The inclusion of powerful equipment like Embercleave and Shadowspear enhances the deck's ability to deal damage quickly and efficiently. The mana base is carefully constructed to support the deck's color requirements while also providing options for early aggression or late-game stability.

The main focus of this deck is to control the game by countering and removing opposing threats while setting up card advantage and resource manipulation. Elminster serves as the commander, providing a powerful control shell to dictate the pace of the game. The deck includes a variety of counterspells like Counterspell, Force of Negation, and Cryptic Command to prevent opponents from resolving key spells. Removal spells such as Swords to Plowshares and Wrath of God deal with threats already on the board. Card draw and selection options like Brainstorm, Ponder, and Mystic Confluence ensure the deck maintains a full hand and finds the right answers. With a mana-efficient control strategy and a strong land base, this deck aims to outmaneuver opponents and control the game until victory.

The main focus of this deck is to assemble different enchantments and equipment to enhance Light-Paws, Emperor's Voice and create a strong board presence. The deck contains a variety of protective spells and creatures to protect and support the commander. It includes efficient removal spells like Swords to Plowshares and Silence to disrupt opponents' strategies. The deck includes cards that provide card advantage like Sram, Senior Edificer and Esper Sentinel to ensure a steady stream of resources. The goal is to control the game early on with protection and disruption, then overwhelm opponents with a powerful and resilient board state led by Light-Paws.

The deck is focused on utilizing Tifa Lockhart as the commander for an aggressive playstyle. The main strategy revolves around ramping up mana with cards like Birds of Paradise, Elvish Mystic, and Utopia Sprawl to quickly play powerful creatures and pump spells like Berserk and Scale Up. The deck also includes protection spells like Vines of Vastwood and Veil of Summer to keep Tifa and other key creatures safe. With a strong mana base and a mix of efficient threats and pump spells, the deck aims to apply early pressure, quickly overwhelm the opponent, and secure a fast victory in a 1 vs 1 Duel Commander format.
